category.name: Contacts
category.definition: A list of contacts in your phone, address book, or social graph. This would be directly identifiable information for your contacts.
category.benefits: Finding friends who use the same service.
category.consequences: You are giving out direct identifying information about your friends and family without their consent. This option has the same consequences as contact info for yourself, but it's for all your contacts instead. This allows scammers to send your friends and family spam calls, texts, and emails.
